hero.subtitle: Explore the fusion of 2D and technology in the music world, feel the infinite possibilities of future music

about.title: About Us
about.story_p1: Dulcets was founded in 2023, an innovative music company specializing in 2D music creation and virtual artist development. We are dedicated to breaking traditional music boundaries, perfectly fusing technology with art to create unique musical experiences.
about.story_p2: We believe music is the bridge connecting reality and virtual worlds. Through advanced technology and our creative team, we are building an entirely new musical universe.

releases.title: Latest Releases
releases.desc: Explore our latest music works and feel the charm of future music

music_production.desc: Professional music production team creates high-quality music works for you
